bibl.title: Prefectural Edicts: A Rejoinder.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Bar-Ilan Studies in History 2. Confrontation and Coexistence (Ramat Gan, Israel, 1983) pp. 77-78. - Ã€ propos de: Ranon KATZOFF, The Validity of Prefectural Edicts in Roman Egypt, Bar-Ilan Studies in History (Ramat Gan, Israel, 1978) pp. 45-53. "Dr. Katzoff suggests that the authority of the praefectus Aegypti may have been a continuation of an attribute inherent in Ptolemaic kingship. Two points speak against such a deduction."
